title: How far along is the field of nanotechnology? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's actually much further than most of us imagine. For a list of nanotechnology-based consumer products introduced on the market look here: CPI Home You'll be amazed how many products are using nanotechnology already.As for engineering: There are several universities offering degrees in Nanoengineering. Apart from that there is  NanobiotechnologyNanoelectromechanical relayNanofluidicsNanohubNanometrologySo, it's here and it's going to stay and it's going to be one of the KEY technologies in the very next future!
